## Notifier.subscribe() method

Subscribes to notification of changes in an object's state.

**Signature:**

```typescript
subscribe(subscriber: Subscriber, propertyToWatch?: any): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

subscriber


</td><td>

[Subscriber](../fast-element.subscriber/)


</td><td>

The object that is subscribing for change notification.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

propertyToWatch


</td><td>

any


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The name of the property that the subscriber is interested in watching for changes.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

Some implementation may or may not require the propertyToWatch.
